thread.title: Inmate serving 99 years for theft escapes work center
thread.title_full: Inmate serving 99 years for theft escapes work center

title: Inmate serving 99 years for theft escapes work center
text:
Published By: Montgomery Advertiser - Today 
Authorities say an inmate serving 99 years has escaped from the Red Eagle Work Center in Alabama. ...
